scenario_text.value: Ha...ru?
(Is Miyuki back to normal now?)

So you can still recognize me? Even with all
these wrinkles?
Your eyes haven’t changed one bit...

And Renamon... You haven’t changed at all,
either.

Oh, Miyuki! I finally get to hear you say my
name again!
Sorry for keeping you waiting so long.

It’s okay! Just having you back means the
world to me...

I wanted to come back, too, you know. Hehe...
But where are we, anyway?

Guys! Save that for later! We need to
skedaddle!

Saving Miyuki is Priority #1, like we
discussed! Remember?

Akiharu! Renamon! Let’s get Miyuki out of
here!

All right, everyone! We’ve got Miyuki... Now
it’s time to escape!

Wait... I can’t move! Something’s coming from
behind!

You can’t have her! My priestess will bring
my ultimate desire to fruition!
Ugh, I can’t... Too strong... AHHH!
Dammit! We can’t let that hand grab Miyuki!
Run...! I’m still under...his control...
No! Miyuki!
I promised I’d never abandon you again!

That’s why I have to... Ergh! Get away from
Miyuki!
Akiharu! Don’t!

(The professor’s trying to pry Miyuki free
from the Master!)
Hmph! Pitiful!

Stop, Professor, it’s too dangerous! Let go
already!
I can’t! I’ll never let go of her again!
Then I’ll tear you apart!
Look out!

I’m not gonna let this happen, not on my
watch!
(The Master’s hand pierced Renamon’s body!)
Haru...hurry!
Why would you...protect me?
Hurry... Save Miyuki!
What’s...going on?
Rena...mon? What are you doing?

It’s okay, Miyuki. Nothing for you to worry
about.
So, please... Agh!

No, this can’t be happening... And it’s all
my fault?

Don’t feel bad... I’m just happy I could
protect you...

If you and your brother... If you two are
both okay, then I...
Renamon!

I leave the rest to you...the real Haru. Go
now, save your sister!
Renamon! NO! Renamon!!!

You mean so much to me... My destined
partner, Miyuki...
Renamon... No... AHHHHHHHHH!
Sis!
No, Miyuki! Stay with us!

The girl shall never return. I shall never
allow it!
Damn, he’s back again! Damn it all, Takuma!

(We finally make it this far, and now we lose
another one of us?)

What do we do now, Takuma?! Keep going or
pull back?!
It’s over! We have no chance! We have to run!

(It was reckless of us to face him in the
first place...)

Keep it together, Takuma, or else none of us
will make it!

Dammit! If Takuma isn’t running, then neither
am I!
Don’t be reckless, Minoru!
(Everyone’s freaking out...)

If we’re gonna do something crazy, now’s the
time! We’re with you, Minoru!
No, Kaito! You’ll die!
Sis! I...I just wanted to...
(The professor’s in the depths of despair...)
What about me?
What the hell should I do?

I’m here with you, Takuma. I always will be,
don’t forget that!
Thank you, Agumon...
If you start to falter, just lean on me.

Even if you think you can’t go on, I’ll never
give up on you! On your future!

I’ll make sure you don’t have anything to
worry about or fear!
Are you trying to say...
It’s too soon to give up?

And it’s okay to want to rescue Miyuki...?
It’s okay to want to save the world?!

Of course it is! And I’ll make those wishes
come true!
Hah! Looks like they beat me to it, Akiharu!
What do you mean, Gabumon?

You’re just like him. You’d never give up on
her.

You said you promise to save Miyuki this
time, didn’t you?
Yes, but in the end, I...

Renamon was willing to risk her life because
you didn’t give up!

Let me support you! I’m your partner through
anything and everything!

If you can’t save Miyuki on your own, I’ll
give you the extra push you need!
I’m done with questioning myself, Professor!

We have Agumon and the others with us!
They’re our partners in battle to the end!

So please don’t give up! Together, we can
rescue Miyuki, and...
...then we’ll save the world, I swear it!

Right... You’re right, Takuma! We have
a purpose!

To save my sister! That’s the only path
forward!
What’s happening? I feel all hot inside...

Rrgh?! This is...like nothing I’ve ever felt
before! So many feelings...

Agumon? Gabumon? What’s going on with you
two?

I feel the intensity of Takuma’s emotions!
It’s like I’ve always been waiting for this!

Same for me! I feel the power of Akiharu’s
resolve surging inside me!
I can’t take it anymore! AAAHHHHHH!

Our current forms can’t handle such intense
emotions, Agumon!
You’re right! We must...become one!
Agumon, evolve tooo...!
Gabumon, evolve tooo...!
OMEGAMON!
Agumon and Gabumon merged into one!
How can this be happening?!

Takuma, Akiharu! I, Omegamon, will handle
this!
Omegamon?
Is this for real? This could turn the tide...
Maybe we have a better chance now...
We do! We’re gonna make it!
We’re following you, Takuma!

Okay, Omegamon! Can you get Miyuki free for
us?

We’re counting on you, Omegamon. Please save
my sister!
No problem! Leave it to me!
